translation.zh: （酒吧） 晚上在路边走很安全

translation.en: and you don't have to worry about,
translation.zh: 不必担心

translation.en: somebody jumping out from the bushes
translation.zh: 有人从草丛中跳出来

translation.en: and hitting you on the head and taking your wallet.
translation.zh: 打你的头 抢你的包

translation.en: We don't want to fool ourselves into thinking that
translation.zh: 我们不想自欺欺人地说

translation.en: we don't have things that go on here,
translation.zh: 这里从来没发生过这种事

translation.en: but we take a pretty proactive approach and...
translation.zh: 但我们采取了有效的措施而且…

translation.en: you know, we try to deal with things swiftly.
translation.zh: 迅速地解决案件

translation.en: Something that comes in as a sexual assault,
translation.zh: 发生性侵犯这种事

translation.en: certainly raises your ire.
translation.zh: 肯定会让人愤怒

translation.en: Based upon the information that was given by the girls,
translation.zh: 根据这两个女孩子所提供的信息

translation.en: we had a list of names of people that had been at this house.
translation.zh: 我们列出了一份 案发时在房子里的人的名单

translation.en: We were able to round them up, bring them in, and we went from there.
translation.zh: 我们可以把他们一起抓起来 进而开始调查

translation.en: Tell me about--
translation.zh: （诺德韦县警局队长 大卫格利登）

translation.en: [White] From the time of call, to victims interviewed,
translation.zh: 从接到报案 跟受害人访谈

translation.en: suspects interviewed, people in jail...
translation.zh: 嫌疑人审问 收押进监…

translation.en: we're talking about four hours.
translation.zh: 只用了四小时

translation.en: That's pretty darn quick.
translation.zh: 这非常迅速

translation.en: [Charlie] Monday, we went to school.
translation.zh: 周一 我们去学校

translation.en: And... It was 180 from that Friday.
translation.zh: 情况跟周五比 发生了180度大转折

translation.en: The Friday before. It was...
translation.zh: 是上周五…

translation.en: one school divided.
translation.zh: 学校里的情况不一样了

translation.en: It was weird, because I always sat at a table filled with people.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 因为以前 总有很多人跟我坐一张桌子

translation.en: Like, my teammates.
translation.zh: 比如 队友们

translation.en: People I thought were my friends.
translation.zh: 我以为是我的朋友

translation.en: I had absolutely nobody. [chuckles] No one.
translation.zh: 我完全没有朋友 一个都没有

translation.en: I was one of the athletes.
translation.zh: 我是学校体育代表队的一员

translation.en: I was All-Conference and All-District in sports and...
translation.zh: 参加全美比赛

translation.en: once all that happened, that was all taken from me in an instant.
translation.zh: 而那件事发生之后 我立刻就无法参赛了

translation.en: I was now known as "Daisy's brother."
translation.zh: 我的身份是“黛西的哥哥”

translation.en: [Michael Coleman] And it's a girl. Catherine Daisy.
translation.zh: 是个女孩 凯瑟琳黛西

translation.en: Okay, go. Go. Get your mother.
translation.zh: 好的 去 去找妈妈

translation.en: -Get your mother. -[giggling]
translation.zh: 找妈妈

translation.en: [Melinda] Mike was actually an electrical engineer when I met him.
translation.zh: 我认识他时 他是个电子工程师

translation.en: And, um, I was in vet school
translation.zh: 我当时在上兽医学校

translation.en: and he told me he had always wanted to be a doctor.
translation.zh: 他跟我说他一直都想当名医生

translation.en: [chuckles] So, for the next...
translation.zh: 于是 接下来…

translation.en: Gosh, four years of med school, internship and then residency,
translation.zh: 四年的医学院 实习然后是住院医师

translation.en: I supported the family and had...
translation.zh: 我支撑着这个家…

translation.en: had babies every 20 months. [laughs] It's pretty much...
translation.zh: 每20个月就生一个孩子 非常…

translation.en: Sissy eating ice cream.
translation.zh: 妹妹吃冰淇淋 （1999年1月12日）

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: 妈

translation.en: [Daisy] Before my dad died,
translation.zh: 我爸爸去世前

translation.en: I always remembered thinking that he's never gonna die.
translation.zh: 我一直以为他永远不会死

translation.en: Like, he's too big and strong to die.
translation.zh: 他非常强壮 不可能死

translation.en: Literally nothing's gonna happen to him.
translation.zh: 什么都不会发生在他身上

translation.en: [Michael] And there's the birthday girl. Cheese.
translation.zh: 小寿星来了 茄子

translation.en: I'll love this 20 years from now,
translation.zh: 我20年后肯定会很喜欢这一幕

translation.en: just seeing what I'm seeing, a close-up of Daisy.
translation.zh: 看着眼前的一切 看着黛西长大

translation.en: [Daisy] I was about nine at the time.
translation.zh: 我当时差不多9岁

translation.en: And we were heading to a wrestling tournament.
translation.zh: 正赶去看摔跤比赛

translation.en: Some black ice had frozen over the night before.
translation.zh: 前一晚路上结了些暗冰

translation.en: So, when we drove over it, my dad lost total control of the wheel.
translation.zh: 当我们从上面开过去时 我爸爸完全失去了对轮子的控制

translation.en: And we ended up upside down in a ravine.
translation.zh: 车子翻进了一个深沟里

translation.en: [Charlie] When we got to the hospital, I sat there for probably two, three hours.
translation.zh: 我们到医院的时候 我在那里坐了差不多两三个小时

translation.en: I was waiting for one of those Disney movie fantasies to come to life,
translation.zh: 我等着希望有奇迹可以发生

translation.en: where he woke up.
translation.zh: 他会醒过来

translation.en: But he never did.
translation.zh: 但他再也没有醒过来

translation.en: [Melinda] At first, it was just shock for a while.
translation.zh: 开始 一时间很难从中缓过神来

translation.en: And each of them had a tough year.
translation.zh: 每个孩子那一年都很难受

translation.en: And with Daisy, she was so close to her dad.
translation.zh: 黛西跟她爸爸很亲近

translation.en: She was such a daddy's girl.
translation.zh: 她是爸爸的小公主

translation.en: He would always rock her to sleep and...
translation.zh: 他晚上会哄她入睡 早上坐在椅子上 让女儿坐在自己的腿上…

translation.en: she would sit on his lap in the chair in the morning and...
translation.zh: 早上坐在椅子上 让女儿坐在自己的腿上…

translation.en: I worried a lot about how she would handle it.
translation.zh: 我很担心她如何接受这件事

translation.en: Not that we wanted to erase a memory or, not have pictures and stuff,
translation.zh: 并不是我们要删除记忆 扔掉照片和其他东西

translation.en: but it was hard to go by the place on the road where he'd been killed
translation.zh: 但路过他发生意外的那个事发地

translation.en: and his old practice, which was now an administrative building.
translation.zh: 还有以前是他工作的地方 现在是行政大楼了 都会让人难受

translation.en: We decided it would be good to just not be living with ghosts all the time.
translation.zh: 我们决定远离伤心地

translation.en: So, the plan was to go somewhere not too far away,
translation.zh: 所以 计划是搬去一个不太远

translation.en: and... not so much larger that it would be a shock to the kids.
translation.zh: 也别太大的地方 以免吓到孩子们

translation.en: And where they could still come back and visit their friends.
translation.zh: 而且他们还可以回来见见朋友

translation.en: [Charlie] After Dad died, we looked around and looked around at places.
translation.zh: 爸爸去世后 我们找过很多地方 （马里维尔）

translation.en: And the decision to move to Maryville...
translation.zh: 然后决定搬去马里维尔…

translation.en: it fit like a shoe. It was everything we could've asked for.
translation.zh: 感觉那里非常合适 就完全符合我们想要的

translation.en: It was about an hour from Albany.
translation.zh: 那里距离奥尔巴尼大概有一小时车程

translation.en: It was small, but it was also big enough
translation.zh: 很小但也大到

translation.en: that everybody didn't know everything about you.
translation.zh: 不会让人对你无所不知

translation.en: The football team had just won state that year.
translation.zh: 橄榄球队那年刚赢了州冠军

translation.en: So, I knew I was gonna get to play football for a powerhouse program
translation.zh: 我知道我会进入到一支强队

translation.en: and I kinda fell in love with the entire thing.
translation.zh: 我爱上了这里的一切

translation.en: I was my own person, finally, and none of it had to do with
translation.zh: 我终于可以做自己 终于

translation.en: anything bad that had ever happened before.
translation.zh: 无论以前发生过什么糟糕的事 都没什么关系了

translation.en: [Jim Fall] Last year, the high school, the university,
translation.zh: 去年 高中 大学

translation.en: the junior high, the junior varsity...
translation.zh: 中学 校队…

translation.en: Nobody lost a football game.
translation.zh: 从没输过任何一场比赛

translation.en: We were like 60-0 for the year.
translation.zh: （马里维尔市长吉米法尔） 我们那年60场全胜

translation.en: This gets really hokey, but that's... that's small-town America, and that's...
translation.zh: 这有些老生常谈 但我们这可只是个小城镇

translation.en: That's where we are and I guess that's what I am, and I'm proud of it.
translation.zh: 这是我们的成就 这就是我 我很骄傲

translation.en: [Melinda] It just felt like a fresh start and kind of a weight lifted.
translation.zh: 这感觉是个全新的开始 有点如释重负

translation.en: [woman] Okay, sweetie. All set.
translation.zh: 好的 亲爱的 都好了

translation.en: [Melinda] It's kind of empowering in a way.
translation.zh: 某种程度上有种自强的感觉

translation.en: To... have to support the whole family and the triumphs, the feeling strong.
translation.zh: 支撑着这个家 有所成就 感觉很强大

translation.en: We were pretty happy there for a while.
translation.zh: 有段时间我们非常开心

translation.en: [Charlie] Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Right when things started getting better, Daisy's sexual assault case happened and...
translation.zh: 在事情刚刚转好的时候 黛西的性侵犯案件就发生了

translation.en: Maryville being that kind of blessing to me and my family just...
translation.zh: 那个我和我家人 认为有幸搬来的马里维尔…

translation.en: It really did kind of dissolve in an overnight fashion.
translation.zh: 一夜之间就消解了

translation.en: [Daisy] Do you know how, like, Jay Z, it's like J-A-Y-Z?
translation.zh: 你知道怎么拼写Jay Z J-A-Y-Z？

translation.en: -[Paige] Yeah. -I'm doing that, but with a D.
translation.zh: -是的 -我就这么写的 但加了个D

translation.en: -So it's like Day-Z. -Oh. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就变成了Day-Z

translation.en: [Paige] Where are the scissors?
translation.zh: 剪子呢？

translation.en: [Daisy in funny accent] You know what? Quit your whining.
translation.zh: 知道吗？别抱怨了

translation.en: I buy you a T-shirt with some glittered letters and all you do is complain.
translation.zh: 我给你买了件带亮字的T恤 而你就只有抱怨

translation.en: I pay for your school. I feed you, clothe you.
translation.zh: 我给你付学费 供你吃喝 给你买衣服

translation.en: Put a roof over your head. All I hear is naggin'.
translation.zh: 让你居有定所 而我听到的就只有挑刺儿

translation.en: [Robin Bourland] For Paige, I think, it's kind of a double-edged sword.
translation.zh: 对佩吉来说 这有点像双刃剑

translation.en: The juvenile that assaulted Paige went to court
translation.zh: 侵犯佩吉的青少年上了法庭

translation.en: and the judge asked him if he had raped Paige.
translation.zh: 法官问他是否强奸了佩吉 （佩吉的母亲罗宾伯兰）

translation.en: And he said, "Yes." He said, "Was she intoxicated?"
translation.zh: 他说：“是的” 他问：“她喝醉了吗？”

translation.en: And he said, "Yes." He said, "Did she tell you 'no'?"
translation.zh: 他说：“是的” 他问：“她跟你说不了吗？”

translation.en: And he said, "Yes."
translation.zh: 他说：“是的”

translation.en: He was the only one out of the whole bunch that admitted what he did.
translation.zh: 他是那些人里唯一承认自己罪行的人

translation.en: And I think it was probably healing for her to hear that.
translation.zh: 我觉得听到这个 可能对她来说是种治愈

translation.en: [Daisy] Don't be shady.
translation.zh: 不要怀疑

translation.en: [Robin] The negative is, she carried around a lot of guilt about what happened to Daisy.
translation.zh: 负面影响是 她为黛西的事而感到愧疚

translation.en: [Daisy] Ah, success.
translation.zh: 成功了

translation.en: [Daisy] I was just in kind of total shock.
translation.zh: 我完全震惊了

translation.en: Like, I thought something bad would never happen to me.
translation.zh: 我以为永远不会 有不好的事发生在我身上

translation.en: That after my dad died,
translation.zh: 我爸爸去世以后

translation.en: like, I already had my deal of grief in life. I get to...
translation.zh: 我的人生已经很悲伤了 我可以…

translation.en: just live a life where I'm invincible now, like...
translation.zh: 在生活中做到无往不克

translation.en: And that's just a stupid teenage thought.
translation.zh: 那只是青少年愚蠢的想法罢了

translation.en: We really aren't invincible.
translation.zh: 我们真的做不到无往不克

translation.en: People really were kind of, like, verbally attacking me.
translation.zh: 人们用言语攻击我

translation.en: A lot people would just say things, like... calling me a liar.
translation.zh: 很多人会说…说我撒谎

translation.en: I was told not to say anything because it could just mess with the case.
translation.zh: 我被告知什么都别说 因为这可能会导致案子变得复杂

translation.en: Like, I really wanted to stand up for myself,
translation.zh: 我真的想为自己申诉

translation.en: because not very many people were standing up for me.
translation.zh: 因为没有多少人支持我

translation.en: [Charlie] One day, my sister was walking to class in the hallway from the bathroom.
translation.zh: 有一天 我妹妹从卫生间出来 在走廊里往教室走

translation.en: This kid in my class, he decided he was gonna call her "a lying slut"
translation.zh: 我班上的一个同学 决定叫她“撒谎的荡妇”

translation.en: and yell it outside of the door.
translation.zh: 并在门外喊

translation.en: And she heard it and she ran back to the bathroom crying.
translation.zh: 她听到了 跑回卫生间里哭

translation.en: I can't tell you what kind of things ran through my mind.
translation.zh: 我没法告诉你我当时想要干什么

translation.en: I said something to him, like, along the lines of,
translation.zh: 我对他说

translation.en: "Don't you ever say anything to her again."
translation.zh: “你敢再对她说任何话”

translation.en: And I knew for a fact, he's a little weeny bag.
translation.zh: 但我知道 他特别矮小

translation.en: He would have been easy to kick the crap out of.
translation.zh: 要揍他易如反掌

translation.en: There was kind of a rumor, there was no for sure about it,
translation.zh: 当时有个谣言 不太肯定

translation.en: but I found out from the grapevine that there was a video.
translation.zh: 但传闻说有段视频

translation.en: One of the few people I still talk to,
translation.zh: 其中一个跟我还来往的人

translation.en: had seen it and heard about it being passed around.
translation.zh: 看过那段视频 并且听说它已经被传开了

translation.en: He said that it was kind of blurry and it was really dark.
translation.zh: 他说视频有点模糊而且光线很差

translation.en: And then it got more graphic and...
translation.zh: 然后图像清晰点的部分

translation.en: him on top of her and she was just kind of, like...
translation.zh: 能看到他骑在她身上 而她…

translation.en: limp and not really functioning very well.
translation.zh: 身体瘫软也没什么反应

translation.en: He guaranteed I didn't wanna see it
translation.zh: 他肯定我不会想看的

translation.en: and if I did, that bad things would happen.
translation.zh: 而且要是我看了 就会有不好的事发生

translation.en: [Glidden] I know I'm not as young, sharp and smart as you young guys.
translation.zh: 我知道我没你们年轻人 年轻 敏锐 聪明

translation.en: [White] Within four hours of getting the initial call,
translation.zh: 接到报警后的四个小时之内

translation.en: that phone was in evidence.
translation.zh: 那部手机就被收作证据

translation.en: Um, the phone was sent to the forensic laboratory in Kansas City.
translation.zh: 手机被送到堪萨斯城的犯罪实验室

translation.en: Their report came back,
translation.zh: 之后接到他们的报告

translation.en: said that whatever was on that phone was deleted
translation.zh: 说手机里的内容被删除了

translation.en: and that through the magic of Apple computers,
translation.zh: 是在苹果电脑上删的

translation.en: when they say delete, they mean delete.
translation.zh: 他们说的删除是永久性删除

translation.en: It's not like a regular computer or an Android phone,
translation.zh: 不像普通电脑或安卓手机

translation.en: where you can go back... Where you can go back... Move.
translation.zh: 删除之后还可以恢复…走开

translation.en: And you can piece stuff back together on a hard drive.
translation.zh: 可以通过硬盘把东西找回来

translation.en: When they say delete, they mean delete.
translation.zh: 他们说的删除是无法恢复的

translation.en: All the people saying that there's a video out there, all the people that are saying that they saw a video,
translation.zh: 人人都说有个视频在流传 他们看过

translation.en: there's no nice way to say it, they're liars.
translation.zh: 这么说不好 但他们在撒谎

translation.en: You know, unfortunately, you have a lot of people involved in this
translation.zh: 很遗憾 很多牵涉进来的人

translation.en: that are running around, telling a lot of stories.
translation.zh: 到处散播传言

translation.en: You know, and without pointing fingers...
translation.zh: 不是具体指谁…

translation.en: it serves to benefit people's causes
translation.zh: 人们总喜欢

translation.en: by making a lot of things up that really didn't happen and really doesn't exist.
translation.zh: 编造一些根本没发生过 或不存在的事情

translation.en: But don't underestimate the need for attention.
translation.zh: 但是别低估有人想要寻求关注

translation.en: Especially young girls.
translation.zh: 尤其是年轻女孩们

translation.en: There's a lot of pressure on young girls in our society
translation.zh: 我们的社会 给了年轻女孩有很多压力

translation.en: to be pretty, to be liked, to... to be the popular one.
translation.zh: 要漂亮 要招人喜欢 要成为受欢迎的人

translation.en: All of those things. And it's not fair, but it is how our society works.
translation.zh: 所有这种的 这并不公平 但社会就是这样

translation.en: [White on phone] This is Darren. [Melinda on phone] Hi, Darren. This is Melinda Coleman.
translation.zh: -我是德伦 -嗨 德伦 我是米琳达科尔曼

translation.en: -[White] How are you? -[Melinda] All right. How are you?
translation.zh: 你今天如何？ 还不错 你呢？

translation.en: [White] Oh, I'm all right.
translation.zh: 我还好

translation.en: [Melinda] Um, I... I guess I haven't heard anything at all.
translation.zh: 我想我今天 还没有收到任何消息

translation.en: I don't know what's going on at all with any of the case
translation.zh: 不知道案子是否有什么进展

translation.en: and I just kind of wanted to stay in the loop, if that was all right.
translation.zh: 如果可以的话 我只想了解下情况

translation.en: [White] Well, it's in the court system.
translation.zh: 现在进入司法程序了

translation.en: Of course, they've been arraigned. So now...
translation.zh: 当然 他们都被控告了 所以目前…

translation.en: there'll be hearings and more hearings and more hearings.
translation.zh: 会有很多的听证会

translation.en: So, court things could drag out and...
translation.zh: 所以 上庭的事会拖很久…

translation.en: [White] They... it can take literally months.
translation.zh: 听证会…可能会持续数月

translation.en: [Melinda] All right. And as far as the...
translation.zh: 好吧 据说手机里的

translation.en: the cell phone, the video's not retrievable.
translation.zh: 好吧 据说手机里的 视频无法恢复

translation.en: You guys couldn't get anything out of that?
translation.zh: 你们就找不到任何东西？

translation.en: [White] No. Nothing at all.
translation.zh: 什么都找不到

translation.en: [Melinda] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [White] I'm sure that you'll have more questions.
translation.zh: 我肯定你还会有更多问题

translation.en: Feel free to call. Okay?
translation.zh: 随时打给我 好吗？

translation.en: -[Melinda] All right. Thanks. -All right.
translation.zh: -好的 非常感谢 再见 -好的

translation.en: -[White] You bet. Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: 一定 保重 再见

translation.en: [Melinda] I called the sheriff and the prosecutor
translation.zh: 我给警长和检察官打过电话

translation.en: and they told me everything was great.
translation.zh: 他们告诉我一切顺利

translation.en: They had everything, not to worry,
translation.zh: 他们掌握一切证据 不需要担心

translation.en: it would be in court for several more months.
translation.zh: 上庭会再经历数月

translation.en: Came home from work, stopped at the grocery store,
translation.zh: 我下班回家 路过杂货店

translation.en: and Robin, the mother of the other girl that was assaulted, called me and said,
translation.zh: 另一个被侵犯的女孩的妈妈 罗宾打电话给我说

translation.zh: 这样才能才这件事采取措施

translation.zh: 这两个地方的受访者… （诺德韦县行政中心）

translation.zh: …在受访时戒备心都强

translation.zh: 看到办公楼下广场角上

translation.zh: 站满了人

translation.zh: 讲这件事有多肮脏 让人很害怕

translation.zh: 我们知道自己的身份 我们问心无愧

translation.zh: 我们被贴上的标签 我认为那并不是我们

translation.zh: （推特风暴 #马里维尔疯传） 只要谷歌搜索“马里维尔”

translation.zh: 就会跳出成千上万个结果

translation.zh: 很多受访者表示 他们不喜欢网上的这些内容

translation.zh: 实际上 他们觉得受到了攻击 甚至被威胁了

translation.zh: 但她凌晨一点溜出去

translation.zh: 期望会发生些什么？

translation.zh: 有迹象表明这个女孩其实是在撒谎

translation.zh: （匿名者于马里维尔集结） 这使得整个镇撕成两半

translation.zh: “社区中的某个人受到了不公正对待

translation.zh: 黛西和佩吉 我们今天为你们而来”

translation.zh: 引起全国性关注的

translation.zh: 马里维尔青少年强奸案调查 今晚有了新进展

translation.zh: 杰克逊县检察官办公室

translation.zh: 奉命对此案进行重审

translation.zh: 我激动不已

translation.zh: 我感觉要跟 真正关注此案子 并愿意付诸努力的人合作

translation.zh: 真正关注此案子 并愿意付诸努力的人合作

translation.en: [Fall] Twenty years ago, we built a thousand-acre lake
translation.zh: 20年前 我们修了一个上千英亩的湖

translation.zh: 如今那里成为了休闲胜地

translation.zh: 高尔夫锦标赛主办场地

translation.en: and one of the 100 best fishing places in the country and...
translation.zh: 以及全国百强最佳钓鱼胜地 以及…

translation.zh: 有人来报道过这个吗？没有

translation.zh: 但这件事一发生 报道就铺天盖地而来

translation.zh: 在这里不管何时接起电话 听到的都是某某法官打电话来

translation.zh: 听到的都是某某法官打电话来

translation.zh: 挂掉之前已经接起的电话

translation.zh: 接起刚打来的法官的电话

translation.zh: 法官告诉我他的名字…

translation.zh: 我有点受挫 因为我想…

translation.zh: “我知道你为何打电话来”

translation.zh: （原告检方密苏里州 诉被告马修B巴奈特） 当案件是依据受害人的证词审理的

translation.zh: 因此 我曾尝试去收集更多的证据

translation.zh: （成年女性性侵犯检查） 并没有相关的强奸案证据

translation.zh: 能带给我们新的突破

translation.zh: 我们试过回头去找那部手机

translation.zh: “它存在吗？它有存在过吗？

translation.zh: 我们还能拿到吗？”

translation.zh: 从专业角度来看？

translation.zh: 我觉得我不想回答这个问题

translation.zh: 因此 在调查结束时

translation.zh: 据我们手头所掌握的证据 我们已经做出了最大努力

translation.zh: 有时 证据无法表明一切

translation.zh: 但在这个案件中

translation.zh: 我认为我所能提出的指控…

translation.zh: 事实通常很难取证

translation.zh: 法律上的要求很严苛 证据很难满足法律上的要求

translation.zh: 珍贝克拿着判决书走出来的那一刻

translation.zh: 压力非常大

translation.zh: 我们在等着审判结果

translation.zh: 案件的调查结果 以及正义能都得到伸张

translation.zh: 因此 当审判结果最终只是缓刑时

translation.zh: 很难接受

translation.zh: 看得出来 只有那几个男孩决定

translation.zh: 忘掉这件事 继续他们的人生

translation.zh: 并有所成就

translation.zh: 我认为他们所有人 除了还在读高中的

translation.zh: 那个青少年 我觉得他表现得还不错

translation.en: but I think all of the boys are, um, going to college,
translation.zh: 但我认为他们都会上大学

translation.en: and working, and trying to do better.
translation.zh: 工作 更加努力

translation.zh: 这是我们社会的致命缺陷之一

translation.zh: 就是总将过错归咎于男孩 但过错并非总应该归咎于男孩

translation.zh: 在这个世界上 女孩们跟男孩们一样有过失

translation.zh: 所以 人人都有责任

translation.zh: 人人都要做得更好

translation.zh: 我完全同意

translation.zh: 控罪撤销之后

translation.zh: 真是一波未平一波又起

translation.en: Like, all the drama with the social media, and then I was getting in fights.
translation.zh: 社交媒体上的狗血事情 我卷入到争吵之中

translation.en: I hated going to school, I hated going out in public.
translation.zh: 我讨厌去学校 我讨厌去公众场所

translation.en: I couldn't handle any more.
translation.zh: 我再也受不了了

translation.en: I wanted to fight back with everyone,
translation.zh: 我想回击所有人

translation.en: and I wanted to, you know, I wanted them to believe me.
translation.zh: 我想他们相信我

translation.en: You already have this wound just ripped clean open
translation.zh: 你刚受的伤口又被撕开

translation.en: and you're vulnerable and you're going through a really hard time,
translation.zh: 你很脆弱 正处于一段难熬的时期

translation.zh: 而且还有这么多人 揪住这件事来攻击你

translation.zh: 这几乎使得欺凌更加极端

translation.zh: 你开始相信所有这些 他们说你的坏话

translation.zh: 都是真的

translation.zh: 因此 你对自己的看法完全变了

translation.zh: 实在让人难以置信

translation.zh: （米歇尔科尔曼医生） 我们搬回到奥尔巴尼

translation.zh: 因为我们在那儿还有房子

translation.zh: 我还以为 至少孩子们是安全的

translation.zh: 一开始黛西很坚强 但随后这会将你折磨殆尽

translation.zh: 她开始变得非常消沉

translation.zh: 感觉她本该做些不同的事

translation.zh: 她把所有的负面影响都憋在心里

translation.zh: 她把头发染成黑色 剃光了半边的头发

translation.zh: 她烫伤自己
